login-prompt: Log into your account to benefit from the following advantages regarding campaigns

benefits.campaign-save: save the campaigns in your profile
benefits.feedback-opportunity: opportunity to provide feedback after a campaign is conducted
benefits.unsubscribe-anytime: you can unsubscribe at any moment

participate-modal.title: Participation in a campaign
participate-modal.text: Do you want to sign up for participation in this campaign?

participate-apply-title: Fill in the following information to sign up
participate-provide-information-text: Please provide the following information beforehand

unsubscribe-modal.title: Unsubscribe from a campaign
unsubscribe-modal.text: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe from participating in this campaign?
